articleData.blog_content: Not only an organization but a home away from home is all I feel for this beautiful family. Randomly landed for an interview along with 3 of my friends ,initially my idea wasn't so clear about Desire , though I roughly knew the outline of its functioning. Initially I applied as a HR intern but, finally my finesse in the skill of selling that too with a warm smile got me a spot in the Sales department . The day also taught me that a smile and fearless actions are the key to master the most hyped times in life too. From the time I got on board I made quite new friends with some being too special and guiding my way out of tough situations and even sharing my work loads to meet the deadlines. Soon I realised the crux of my past experiences dating back to my stay at my hometown Muzaffarpur needed to be at test for the needs of the underprivileged as I started going on slum visits and creating an unconventional bond of belonging with them. With this spirit I started my journey from a Sales intern to becoming an Adhyayan coordinator .After being the coordinator I really felt how much We as people who got so many privileges need to cater to the pain of these individuals. Not only have I grown out my personality for the better but have also felt the happiness seeing the children get admission in good schools and being proud that I and my Desire Family has been a part in their life's beginning towards a bright future.
articleData.blog_headline: Uncertainty and a smile is the way
